---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an enhancement or new feature
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Is your feature request related to a problem?

A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Example: "I'm frustrated when [...]"

## Proposed Solution

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. Include:
- Expected behavior
- How it would improve the user experience
- Any specific implementation details you've considered

## Alternatives Considered

A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Case

Describe your specific use case for this feature:
- What are you trying to accomplish?
- How often would you use this feature?
- How many users might benefit from this?

## Proposed UI/UX

If applicable, describe or sketch how this feature would appear in the UI:
- Menu locations
- Dialog boxes
- Settings
- Mockups or wireframes (attach images if available)

## Technical Considerations

If you have technical knowledge, share any implementation thoughts:
- Potential challenges
- Dependencies or libraries that might help
- Compatibility concerns

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.

## Related Issues

Link any related issues or pull requests.

## Voyant Tools Integration

If this relates to Voyant Tools integration:
- Voyant Tools version or URL
- Specific Voyant features this would support
- Expected behavior in Voyant after export
